welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pyinmana, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Feel Restaurant
restaurants.description: The Feel Restaurant is a restaurant located in Naypyidaw.
restaurants.address: No(32/36), Corner Of Pan Khinn Street, Nay Pyi Taw, Mandalay Region

restaurants.name: Shwe Htan Pin ရေွှထန်းပင်
restaurants.description: Shwe Htan Pin ရေွှထန်းပင် is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: ေက်ာက္မဲယူနန္
restaurants.description: ေက်ာက္မဲယူနန္ is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Shwe Taung Gyi
restaurants.description: Shwe Taung Gyi is a bbq joint located in Pyinmana.
restaurants.address: No.41, Taung Nyo Road, Pyinmana, Mandalay Region

restaurants.name: Shwe Pu Zunn
restaurants.description: Shwe Pu Zunn is a bakery located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tilin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tilin Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free wifi network by connecting to 'Tilin Airport Wifi' and accepting the terms and conditions.
